#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char stak[400];
int top=0;
void push(char x)
{
    stak[top]=x;
  //  cout<<stak[top];
    top++;
}
void pop()
{
    cout<<stak[top-1];
    top--;
}

int main()
{
    top=0;
    int t,len;
    char a[400];
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a;
        len=strlen(a);
       // cout<<len<<endl;
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
        {

            if(a[i]=='(')
                continue;
            else if(a[i]== '+' ||a[i]=='-' ||a[i]== '*' ||a[i]== '/' ||a[i]== '^' )
                {
                  //  cout<<"her";
                    push(a[i]);
                }
            else if (a[i]== ')')
               {
                   //cout<<"sad";
                   pop();
}
            else
                {
                    //cout<<"afs";
                    cout<<a[i];
                }
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
}
